column4: hey guys - anything know anything about ssh X11 forwarding in hardy?
my hardy client machine doesn't seem to be doing it, even if I ssh -X
should be same as in gutsy
what is the issue? i came in late to the convo
ssh -X isn't forwarding my X traffic
are you getting any kind of error?
the camelot host is the new ubuntu 8.04 ?
nope, camelot is running lenny. the client host is hardy
let me try that..i have just installed Hardy
no problem here,  hardy ssh client into gutsy..forwarding X
ahh, that surely will prevent you from getting in
nevermind... I thought mine was missing, just slow tab completion
I didn't have xauth on the server, I should clarify
